mapper.select: SELECT sum(ST_area(ST_INTERSECTION(ta.GEOM,tc.GEOM))) as natureArea, remark as natureAreaName, ta.gid,st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM population ta, landUse tc WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tc.geom) AND remark= '자연녹지지역' GROUP BY tc.remark, ta.gid ORDER BY natureArea

SELECT sum(ST_area(ST_INTERSECTION(ta.GEOM,tc.GEOM))) as natureArea, remark as natureAreaName, ta.gid,st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM totalraster ta, landUse tc WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tc.geom) AND remark= '자연녹지지역' GROUP BY tc.remark, ta.gid ORDER BY gid

SELECT sum(ST_area(ST_INTERSECTION(ta.GEOM,tc.GEOM))) as indusArea, remark as natureAreaName, ta.gid, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM population ta, landUse tc WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tc.geom) AND remark= '공업지역' GROUP BY tc.remark, ta.gid ORDER BY indusArea

SELECT sum(ST_area(ST_INTERSECTION(ta.GEOM,tc.GEOM))) as indusArea, remark as natureAreaName, ta.gid, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM totalraster ta, landUse tc WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tc.geom) AND remark= '공업지역' GROUP BY tc.remark, ta.gid ORDER BY indusArea

SELECT sum(ST_area(ST_INTERSECTION(ta.GEOM,tc.GEOM))) as commerArea, remark as natureAreaName, ta.gid,st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM population ta, landUse tc WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tc.geom) AND remark= '상업지역' GROUP BY tc.remark, ta.gid ORDER BY commerArea

SELECT sum(ST_area(ST_INTERSECTION(ta.GEOM,tc.GEOM))) as commerArea, remark as natureAreaName, ta.gid,st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM totalraster ta, landUse tc WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tc.geom) AND remark= '상업지역' GROUP BY tc.remark, ta.gid ORDER BY commerArea

SELECT sum(ST_area(ST_INTERSECTION(ta.GEOM,tc.GEOM))) as liveArea, remark as natureAreaName, ta.gid,st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM population ta, landUse tc WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tc.geom) AND remark= '주거지역' GROUP BY tc.remark, ta.gid ORDER BY liveArea

SELECT sum(ST_area(ST_INTERSECTION(ta.GEOM,tc.GEOM))) as liveArea, remark as natureAreaName, ta.gid,st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM totalraster ta, landUse tc WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tc.geom) AND remark= '주거지역' GROUP BY tc.remark, ta.gid ORDER BY liveArea
SELECT trunc(popval,2) as popCnt,st_astext(geom) as wkt, gid FROM population WHERE popval != 0 GROUP BY gid ORDER BY popCnt
SELECT trunc(popval,2) as popCnt, gid, st_astext(geom) as wkt FROM totalraster WHERE popval != 0 ORDER BY popcnt

SELECT ta.gid, max(tenhuffval)*100 as tenYrHuff, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM( SELECT ta.gid, tenhuffval, ta.geom FROM totalraster ta, tenyearhuff tb WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tb.geom) and tb.tenhuffval > 0 ) ta GROUP BY gid, geom ORDER BY tenYrHuff

SELECT ta.gid, max(tenmonoval)*100 as tenYrMono, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM( SELECT ta.gid, tenmonoval, ta.geom FROM totalraster ta, tenyearmono tb WHERE tb.tenmonoval > 0 AND st_intersects(ta.geom,tb.geom) ) ta GROUP BY gid, geom ORDER BY tenYrMono

SELECT ta.gid, max(thrhuffval)*100 as thrYrHuff, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM( SELECT ta.gid, thrhuffval, ta.geom FROM totalraster ta, thryearhuff tb WHERE tb.thrhuffval > 0 AND st_intersects(ta.geom,tb.geom) ) ta GROUP BY gid, geom ORDER BY thrYrHuff

SELECT ta.gid, max(thrmonoval)*100 as thrYrMono, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM( SELECT ta.gid, thrmonoval, ta.geom FROM totalraster ta, thryearmono tb WHERE tb.thrmonoval > 0 AND st_intersects(ta.geom,tb.geom) )ta GROUP BY gid, geom ORDER BY thrYrMono

SELECT ta.gid, max(fifhuffval)*100 as fiftYrHuff, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM( SELECT ta.gid, fifhuffval, ta.geom FROM totalraster ta, fifyearhuff tb WHERE tb.fifthuffval > 0 AND st_intersects(ta.geom,tb.geom) ) ta GROUP BY gid, geom ORDER BY fiftYrHuff

SELECT ta.gid, max(fifmonoval)*100 as fiftYrMono, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM( SELECT ta.gid, fifmonoval, ta.geom FROM totalraster ta, fifyearmono tb WHERE tb.fiftmonoval > 0 AND st_intersects(ta.geom,tb.geom) ) ta GROUP BY gid, geom ORDER BY fiftYrMono

SELECT count(*) as buildCnt, wkt FROM( SELECT tc.*, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM totalraster ta, buildInfo tc WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tc.geom) ) as mtb WHERE basemcnt > 0 or buildage >= 30 GROUP BY wkt ORDER BY buildCnt

SELECT count(*) as buildCnt, wkt FROM( SELECT tc.*, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM totalraster ta, buildInfo tc WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tc.geom) ) as mtb WHERE basemcnt > 0 or buildage >= 30 GROUP BY wkt ORDER BY buildCnt

SELECT count(*) as protectFacilityCnt, wkt FROM( SELECT tc.*, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM population ta, protectfacilty tc WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tc.geom) ) as mtb GROUP BY wkt ORDER BY protectFacilityCnt

SELECT count(*) as protectFacilityCnt, wkt FROM( SELECT tc.*, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM totalraster ta, protectfacilty tc WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tc.geom) ) as mtb GROUP BY wkt ORDER BY protectFacilityCnt

SELECT sum((ST_area(ST_INTERSECTION(ta.GEOM,tc.GEOM)) / St_area(tc.geom)) * dgm_lt) as roadLen, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM population ta, road tc WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tc.geom)
GROUP BY ta.gid ORDER BY roadLen

SELECT sum((ST_area(ST_INTERSECTION(ta.GEOM,tc.GEOM)) / St_area(tc.geom)) * dgm_lt) as roadLen, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM totalraster ta, road tc WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tc.geom) GROUP BY ta.gid ORDER BY roadLen
SELECT st_astext(geom) wkt, gid FROM population GROUP BY gid
SELECT st_astext(geom) wkt, gid FROM totalraster GROUP BY gid

SELECT ta.gid, max(tenhuffval)*100 as tenYrHuff, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM( SELECT ta.gid, tenhuffval, ta.geom FROM totalraster ta, tenyearhuff tb WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tb.geom) ) ta GROUP BY gid, geom ORDER BY tenYrHuff

SELECT ta.gid, max(tenmonoval)*100 as tenYrMono, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM( SELECT ta.gid, tenmonoval, ta.geom FROM totalraster ta, tenyearmono tb WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tb.geom) ) ta GROUP BY gid, geom ORDER BY tenYrMono

SELECT ta.gid, max(thrhuffval)*100 as thrYrHuff, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM( SELECT ta.gid, thrhuffval, ta.geom FROM totalraster ta, thryearhuff tb WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tb.geom) ) ta GROUP BY gid, geom ORDER BY thrYrHuff

SELECT ta.gid, max(thrmonoval)*100 as thrYrMono, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM( SELECT ta.gid, thrmonoval, ta.geom FROM totalraster ta, thryearmono tb WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tb.geom) )ta GROUP BY gid, geom ORDER BY thrYrMono

SELECT ta.gid, max(fifhuffval)*100 as fiftYrHuff, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM( SELECT ta.gid, fifhuffval, ta.geom FROM totalraster ta, fifyearhuff tb WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tb.geom) ) ta GROUP BY gid, geom ORDER BY fiftYrHuff

SELECT ta.gid, max(fifmonoval)*100 as fiftYrMono, st_astext(ta.geom) as wkt FROM( SELECT ta.gid, fifmonoval, ta.geom FROM totalraster ta, fifyearmono tb WHERE st_intersects(ta.geom,tb.geom) ) ta GROUP BY gid, geom ORDER BY fiftYrMono
SELECT st_astext(geom) as wkt, ddr_nam FROM swl_dodr_as
SELECT st_astext(geom) as wkt FROM floodborder
